member.name: T:SMOLS2000.OpenFile
member.summary: Class contains objects representing 1 open audio file.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.#ctor(SMOLS2000.MainWindow)
member.summary: Constructor for initializing opening file sequence (with "Open" button).

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.#ctor(SMOLS2000.MainWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for initializing opening file sequence (using drag/drop function, providing file path).
member.param: Complete path to the AV file (passed as a string)

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getSampleValue(System.Int64,System.Int16)
member.summary: Method returns one sample (signed short) at a given number and channel.
member.param: Number of sample that has to be returned (starting with 0)
member.returns: 1 short value, representing sample value (signed 16-bit short)

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.readAudioChunk(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Asynchronous task aimed to read a certain chunk of open file.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.audioFileAnalysis
member.summary: Method updating open AV file parameters (noise power, signal power, etc.).

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getPlayTime
member.summary: Method returns total time of open AV file as a string.
member.returns: String containing total AV play time

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getSignalLevel
member.summary: Returns calculated normalised signal level.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getNoiseLevel
member.summary: Returns calculated normalised noise level.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getFileName
member.summary: Returns file name string (name, not full path).

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getSampleRate
member.summary: Returns sample rate as an integer in Hz.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getTotalSamplesNumber
member.summary: Returns total number of available audio samples as ulong value.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.OpenFile.getNumberOfChannels
member.summary: Returns total number of available audio channels.

member.name: T:SMOLS2000.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Silnie typizowana klasa zasobów do wyszukiwania zlokalizowanych ciągów itd.

member.name: P:SMOLS2000.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Zwraca buforowane wystąpienie składnika ResourceManager używane przez tę klasę.

member.name: P:SMOLS2000.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Przesłania właściwość CurrentUICulture bieżącego wątku dla wszystkich przypadków przeszukiwania zasobów za pomocą tej silnie typizowanej klasy zasobów.

member.name: T:SMOLS2000.SaveFile
member.summary: Class containing objects responsible for AV files saving.

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.#ctor(SMOLS2000.OpenFile)
member.summary: Constructor created as a beginning for saving file sequence. Constructor opens new user dialog for saving file and saves new file path as an internal property.
member.param: Current instance of openFile class; Thanks to this one can read all required properties

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.saveSingleSample(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Method used for saving every single output sample (one-way data flow).
member.param: Select channel number; Avoid selecting non-existing channel

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.saveAudioChunk
member.summary: Internal method saves given group of samples (if there are enough samples available). They may be saved into RAM memory or step-by-step to the file (depends on selected file format).

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.saveWavChunk(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte},System.Int16)
member.summary: Internal method for saving one WAV file chunk.
member.param: 1D bytes list containing linearised local samples buffer (all channels)
Number of channels to save in WAV file

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.saveMp3Chunk(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte},System.Int16)
member.summary: Internal method for saving one mp3 file chunk.
member.param: 1D bytes list containing linearised local samples buffer (all channels)
Number of channels to save in mp3 file

member.name: M:SMOLS2000.SaveFile.Close
member.summary: Release resources, close saved files.
